name: NSTextFinder.Action
desc: These constants specify the user interface item tags that correspond find action. These constants are passed to the performTextFinderAction(_:) method, the responder will call the appropriate method for the tag. That method will, in turn, determine the desired action and invoke the appropriate method in the NSTextFinder objectâ€™s NSTextFinderClient protocol.

items.name: case showFindInterface
items.desc: The find bar interface is displayed.

items.name: case nextMatch
items.desc: The next match, if any, is displayed.

items.name: case previousMatch
items.desc: The previous match, if any, is displayed.

items.name: case replaceAll
items.desc: All occurrences of the string are replaced.

items.name: case replace
items.desc: Replaces a single instance of the string.

items.name: case replaceAndFind
items.desc: Replaces a single instance of the string and searches for the next match.

items.name: case replaceAllInSelection
items.desc: Replaces all occurrences of the string within the current selection.

items.name: case selectAllInSelection
items.desc: Selects all matching search strings within the current selection.

items.name: case showReplaceInterface
items.desc: Displays the find bar interface including the replace functionality.

items.name: case hideReplaceInterface
items.desc: Displays the find bar interface including the replace functionality.
